name: com.phoenixtech.dashboard
description: A starter dashboard project for Phoenix Tech
author: Juan Hern√°ndez <jhertzdev@gmail.com>

scripts.build-android-apk: quasar build -m capacitor -T android && cd src-capacitor/android && gradlew assembleRelease && %APPDATA%\..\Local\Android\Sdk\build-tools\33.0.1\zipalign  -v 4 ../../src-capacitor/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release-unsigned.apk ../../src-capacitor/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk && %APPDATA%\..\Local\Android\Sdk\build-tools\33.0.1\apksigner sign --ks ../../my-release-key.keystore --ks-key-alias alias_name ../../src-capacitor/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk
